data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Anafu
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Anafu, Tokelau
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Anafu, Tokelau honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Anafu.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Anafu.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Atafu Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Atafu Village, Anafu, Tokelau.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Anafu, Tokelau.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Anafu, Tokelau.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 17 believers in Anafu and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
